    Moose_survey

Function reference

All functions

assign_categories()
Assign Moose Stratification categories Assign each block a high, medium or low category based on assigned values or quartile.
buffer_streams()
Buffer streams by stream order
calculate_areas()
Calculate area of block
cutblocks_recent()
Select recent cutblocks for Moose habitat
fires_recent()
Select recent fire years for Moose habitat
get_basedata()
Get base data required from bc data catalogue
high_elev()
Get high elevation areas
merge_habit()
Merge habitat areas
merge_nonhabit()
Merge uninhabitable areas
skmoose_example()
helper function to get local file.path for test package dataset.
steep_slope()
Create steep slope exclusion layer
vri_browse()
Filter Moose Browse Species
